### 1. chip

#### 1.1 chip info

chip name : STM32F407ZGT6.

extern oscillator : 8MHz.

uart pin: TX/RX PA9/PA10.

spi pin: SCK/MISO/MOSI/CS  PA5/PA6/PA7/PA4.

reset pin: RESET PA8.

int pin: INT PB0

### 2. shell

#### 2.1 shell parameter

baud rate: 115200

data bits : 8

stop bits: 1

parity: none

flow control: none

### 3. pmw3901mb

#### 3.1 command Instruction

​           pmw3901mb is a basic command which can test all pmw3901mb driver function:

​           -i        show pmw3901mb chip and driver information.

​           -h       show pmw3901mb help.

​           -p       show pmw3901mb pin connections of the current board.

​           -t (reg | read <height> <times> | frame <times> | interrupt <times>)

​           -t  reg        run pmw3901mb register test.

​           -t read <height> <times>        run pmw3901mb read test.height is the chip height.times is the test times.

​           -t frame <times>        run pmw3901mb frame capture test. times is the test times.

​           -t interrupt <times>        run pmw3901mb interrupt test. times is the test times.

​           -c (read <height> <times> | frame <times> | interrupt <times>)

​           -c read <height> <times>        run pmw3901mb read function.height is the chip height.times is the test times.

​           -c frame <times>        run pmw3901mb frame capture function. times is the test times.

​           -c interrupt <times>        run pmw3901mb interrupt function. times is the test times.

#### 3.2 command example

```shell
pmw3901mb -i

pmw3901mb: chip is PixArt Imaging PMW3901MB.
pmw3901mb: manufacturer is PixArt Imaging.
pmw3901mb: interface is SPI.
pmw3901mb: driver version is 1.0.
pmw3901mb: min supply voltage is 1.8V.
pmw3901mb: max supply voltage is 3.6V.
pmw3901mb: max current is 70.00mA.
pmw3901mb: max temperature is 85.0C.
pmw3901mb: min temperature is -40.0C.
```

```shell
pmw3901mb -p

pmw3901mb: SCK connected to GPIOA PIN5.
pmw3901mb: MISO connected to GPIOA PIN6.
pmw3901mb: MOSI connected to GPIOA PIN7.
pmw3901mb: CS connected to GPIOA PIN4.
pmw3901mb: RESET connected to GPIOA PIN8.
pmw3901mb: INT connected to GPIOB PIN0.
```

```shell
pmw3901mb -t reg

pmw3901mb: chip is PixArt Imaging PMW3901MB.
pmw3901mb: manufacturer is PixArt Imaging.
pmw3901mb: interface is SPI.
pmw3901mb: driver version is 1.0.
pmw3901mb: min supply voltage is 1.8V.
pmw3901mb: max supply voltage is 3.6V.
pmw3901mb: max current is 70.00mA.
pmw3901mb: max temperature is 85.0C.
pmw3901mb: min temperature is -40.0C.
pmw3901mb: start the register test.
pmw3901mb: pmw3901mb_get_product_id test.
pmw3901mb: product id 0x49.
pmw3901mb: pmw3901mb_get_inverse_product_id test.
pmw3901mb: inverse product id 0xB6.
pmw3901mb: pmw3901mb_get_revison_id test.
pmw3901mb: get revison id 0x00.
pmw3901mb: pmw3901mb_get_motion test.
pmw3901mb: get motion 0x28.
pmw3901mb: pmw3901mb_set_motion test.
pmw3901mb: check motion ok.
pmw3901mb: pmw3901mb_get_delta_x test.
pmw3901mb: delta x is 0.
pmw3901mb: pmw3901mb_get_delta_y test.
pmw3901mb: delta y is 0.
pmw3901mb: pmw3901mb_get_motion_burst test.
pmw3901mb: motion burst is 0x28.
pmw3901mb: pmw3901mb_get_squal test.
pmw3901mb: get squal is 0x00.
pmw3901mb: pmw3901mb_get_raw_data_sum test.
pmw3901mb: get raw data sum is 0x01.
pmw3901mb: pmw3901mb_get_max_raw_data test.
pmw3901mb: get max raw data is 0x04.
pmw3901mb: pmw3901mb_get_min_raw_data test.
pmw3901mb: get min raw data is 0x01.
pmw3901mb: pmw3901mb_get_shutter test.
pmw3901mb: get shutter is 0x0384.
pmw3901mb: pmw3901mb_get_observation test.
pmw3901mb: get observation is 0x3F.
pmw3901mb: pmw3901mb_set_observation test.
pmw3901mb: check observation ok.
pmw3901mb: pmw3901mb_get_raw_data_grab test.
pmw3901mb: get grab is 0x00.
pmw3901mb: pmw3901mb_set_raw_data_grab test.
pmw3901mb: check grab ok.
pmw3901mb: pmw3901mb_get_raw_data_grab_status test.
pmw3901mb: get status is 0x00.
pmw3901mb: pmw3901mb_reset test.
pmw3901mb: check reset ok.
pmw3901mb: pmw3901mb_shutdown test.
pmw3901mb: check shutdown ok.
pmw3901mb: finish the register test.
```

```shell
pmw3901mb -t read 1.0 3

pmw3901mb: chip is PixArt Imaging PMW3901MB.
pmw3901mb: manufacturer is PixArt Imaging.
pmw3901mb: interface is SPI.
pmw3901mb: driver version is 1.0.
pmw3901mb: min supply voltage is 1.8V.
pmw3901mb: max supply voltage is 3.6V.
pmw3901mb: max current is 70.00mA.
pmw3901mb: max temperature is 85.0C.
pmw3901mb: min temperature is -40.0C.
pmw3901mb: start the read test.

pmw3901mb: delta_x: -5.330cm delta_y: -2.132cm.
pmw3901mb: raw_average is 0x42.
pmw3901mb: raw_max is 0xC3.
pmw3901mb: raw_min is 0x44.
pmw3901mb: observation is 0x3F.
pmw3901mb: shutter is 0x1B67.
pmw3901mb: surface quality is 0x01A8.

pmw3901mb: delta_x: 0.213cm delta_y: 0.213cm.
pmw3901mb: raw_average is 0x42.
pmw3901mb: raw_max is 0xC3.
pmw3901mb: raw_min is 0x44.
pmw3901mb: observation is 0x3F.
pmw3901mb: shutter is 0x1B67.
pmw3901mb: surface quality is 0x01A0.

pmw3901mb: delta_x: 0.640cm delta_y: 0.426cm.
pmw3901mb: raw_average is 0x42.
pmw3901mb: raw_max is 0xC6.
pmw3901mb: raw_min is 0x44.
pmw3901mb: observation is 0x3F.
pmw3901mb: shutter is 0x1B67.
pmw3901mb: surface quality is 0x01C0.

pmw3901mb: finish the read test.
```

pmw3901mb: start frame capture test.

```shell
pmw3901mb -h

pmw3901mb -i
	show pmw3901mb chip and driver information.
pmw3901mb -h
	show pmw3901mb help.
pmw3901mb -p
	show pmw3901mb pin connections of the current board.
pmw3901mb -t reg
	run pmw3901mb register test.
pmw3901mb -t read <height> <times>
	run pmw3901mb read test.height is the chip height.times is the test times.
pmw3901mb -t frame <times>
	run pmw3901mb frame capture test.times is the test times.
pmw3901mb -t interrupt <times>
	run pmw3901mb interrupt test.times is the test times.
pmw3901mb -c read <height> <times>
	run pmw3901mb read function.height is the chip height.times is the test times.
pmw3901mb -c frame <times>
	run pmw3901mb frame capture function.times is the test times.
pmw3901mb -c interrupt <times>
	run pmw3901mb interrupt function.times is the test times.
```
